name: Student Taught Courses(StuCo): Palestine: Past and Culture
base_name: Student Taught Courses(StuCo): Palestine: Past and Culture
long_desc: Upon the rise in the social media coverage of the recent issues in Palestine, many people are left with many question. This course will cover the basics of Palestinian culture as it will be the theme which will be used to study the history of Palestine from a political and religious perspective.

custom_fields.goals: Get a basic understanding of the history of Palestine. Learn about the Palestinian culture and enjoying it.
custom_fields.key_topics: History of Palestine and Palestinian culture.
custom_fields.relevance: Upon the rise in the social media coverage of the recent issues in Palestine, many people are left with many question. This course will cover the basics of Palestinian culture as it will be the theme which will be used to study the history of Palestine from a political and religious perspective.
